scripts.prestart:docker: mkdir -p axe-results && sudo chmod 777 axe-results && docker build -t axe .
scripts.start:docker: docker run --rm --network host -v ${PWD}/axe-results:/app/axe-results -e COMMIT_SHA=$(git rev-parse HEAD) axe
scripts.test:e2e:waitForSeverToStart: for i in {1..10}; do nc -z localhost 8080 && break || echo 'Waiting for server to be ready...'; sleep 1; done
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:startServer && npm run test:e2e:waitForSeverToStart && npm run test:e2e:runTests && npm run test:e2e:stop
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:all:docker: docker build -f Dockerfile.tests -t axe-e2e . && docker run --rm --network host axe-e2e
